project.description:
Stylesheets/Test2/convert.xml
SUPPLEMENTARY ANT TEST FILE FOR THE TEI STYLESHEETS.
MDH 2017-01-05: This is part of my experimental build system of which the root build file is build.xml. See that file for detailed documentation. This file is designed to handle running conversions in a platform-independent manner. Its modus operandi is:
- A call is made to a task which is named for the matching symlinked script file in the Stylesheets bin directory (for instance, teitofo).
- If the platform is *NIX, then the matching symlink is called, running the transformtei script, and thus testing the symlink and script.
- If the platform is not *NIX (i.e. it's Windows), then the appropriate ant build script or Saxon transformation that WOULD be called by transformtei is run instead; this tests the actual transformation, which is better than nothing.
Properties such as jar locations and Java classes are inherited from the root build.xml file and thus not defined here.

target.name: teitofo
target.description: TARGET teitofo Converts a single TEI file to fo. Takes one param, inFile.
